summary: This collection focuses on keeping the web weird, emphasizing the importance of maintaining an open, diverse, and innovative internet ecosystem. It encourages engagement with internet advocacy, open-source principles, digital fabrication, guerrilla-style creativity, and digital ownership. The content promotes unconventional thinking and resists uniformity and corporate control, aiming to preserve the unique and user-driven nature of the web. By embracing these concepts, users are empowered to contribute to a more vibrant, creative, and free online environment that fosters innovation and celebrates diversity.
excerpt: Keep The Web Weird advocates for internet freedom through ISOC engagement, open-source principles, digital fabrication, guerrilla creativity, and digital ownership. These steps promote innovation and a diverse, user-driven web ecosystem resistant to uniformity and corporate control.
